history.narrative: Law 19-37, the “Healthy Schools Amendment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-144, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole and the committee on Government Operations and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 21, 2011, and July 12, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 9, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-152 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-37 became effective on October 20, 2011.
